GUI

Class Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • GUI.Map
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class Map
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    shoe the game Game data structure and patch Patch data structure on screen. Method setPatchAndGame(Game,Patch) must celled before repaint.
    Author:
    Aviv Vexler
